title: Sion cannot cast Q for a duration after colliding with R.
body:
I've tested this a good 4 times, after landing R on enemies Sion can no longer charge his Q. You can auto attack or move, but you can not charge Q until the stun wears off the enemy.

This is a vital combo for Sion's engage, please look into it.

Thank you. 

{{champion:14}}

replies.body: Looked into this bug today, should have a fix in for patch 5.19.
You will have a fix for 5.19? Why not hot fix that in for 5.18 so that it can be in the worlds patch? I do not think he would see much play at the world stage if he cannot R Q combo...
Because it's not Zed or Lee.
I would guess bug testing? They probably want to have the worlds patch clean. Hot fixing might spoil that.
He absolutely needs that combo. I'd rather they risk putting something out and disable him if it breaks something else than to have him be unplayable.
Sion doesn't see much competitive play regardless.

It's Sion in the Korean-dominated meta- he's simply too slow and takes too long to ramp up to be honestly viable on the worlds stage anyways. This is Worlds, man- games are decided by minute 15 typically. Yeah, a superhero play or critical failure can change that if one team gets lax, but outside of that the games snowball so fast that Sion slows one team down enough that it's a severe disadvantage.

a really important combo

Just tested it. It currently acts somewhat like Riven's Q disabling her auto attacks but not her movements, to which players bypass by using Q -> move -> attack to create a basic attack that is used directly after the Q. The same can be applied to Sion's R but instead of a auto lock-out it locks out his Q instead for some reason.

So until they fix this or if they never fix this, the way to Q after R is to input a move command then Q.

R lands -> right click -> Q and you'll be able to Q right out of R. Still seems weird that it's locked out in the first place though.

But anyway, there's your temporary (or permanent) fix.
